docs.snippet: With Donald Trump getting ready to take office as president, North Korea is talking about launching a newly perfected intercontinental ballistic missile. Officials in Washington are saying that if Pyongyang launches anything that threatens the ter...
docs.lead_paragraph: With Donald Trump getting ready to take office as president, North Korea is talking about launching a newly perfected intercontinental ballistic missile. Officials in Washington are saying that if Pyongyang launches anything that threatens the territory of the U.S. or its allies, it will be shot down.

headline.main: US, North Korea Trade Warnings Over Potential ICBM Test
headline.print_headline: US, North Korea Trade Warnings Over Potential ICBM Test

docs.snippet: Roche said on Monday that U.S. regulators agreed to priority review of its Tecentriq immunotherapy for an additional type of bladder cancer, a boost to the Swiss drugmaker's bid to expand indications for the drug....
docs.lead_paragraph: Roche said on Monday that U.S. regulators agreed to priority review of its Tecentriq immunotherapy for an additional type of bladder cancer, a boost to the Swiss drugmaker's bid to expand indications for the drug.

headline.main: FDA Speeds Up Review of Roche's Tecentriq to Treat Another Bladder Cancer
headline.print_headline: FDA Speeds Up Review of Roche's Tecentriq to Treat Another Bladder Cancer

docs.snippet: Fast-food giant McDonald's is selling a controlling stake in its China business to a group of investors led by state-owned Chinese conglomerate Citic in a deal worth up to $2.1 billion, the companies said Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fast-food giant McDonald's is selling a controlling stake in its China business to a group of investors led by state-owned Chinese conglomerate Citic in a deal worth up to $2.1 billion, the companies said Monday.
